name: cors
hubDesc: Allow developers to make requests from the browser
description: Easily add Cross-origin resource sharing (CORS) to a Service, a Route by enabling this plugin.

fields.name: origins
fields.help: List of allowed domains for the Access-Control-Allow-Origin header. If you wish to allow all origins, add * as a single value to this configuration field. The accepted values can either be flat strings or PCRE regexes. NOTE: Prior to Kong 0.10.x, this parameter was config.origin (note the change in trailing s), and only accepted a single value, or the * special value.

fields.name: exposed_headers
fields.help: Value for the Access-Control-Expose-Headers header. If not specified, no custom headers are exposed.

fields.name: credentials
fields.help: Flag to determine whether the Access-Control-Allow-Credentials header should be sent with true as the value.

fields.name: max_age
fields.help: Indicated how long the results of the preflight request can be cached, in seconds.

fields.name: preflight_continue
fields.help: A boolean value that instructs the plugin to proxy the OPTIONS preflight request to the upstream service.
